name: Ambidextrous Psychopath
description: Ambidextrous Psychopath is all about the gameplay, and is designed for the gamer who wants a fresh platforming challenge.  It offers a unique take on the platformer genre, offering a 63 level campaign and unique design characteristics.  Ambidextripath is designed to challenge the player to develop strategies to split their focus onto two simultaneously moving player objects.  The game is developed and designed by Rylan Yancey, with a stellar soundtrack composed by the Jogey Man himself.  You have never played a game like Ambidextrous Psychopath.
